title: D&D Technologies QB140 Q-Bolt Drop Bolt, Padlockable with Padlock Storage Feature, for Square Post Metal Gates, 40" Length
features: PADLOCKABLE- The Q-Bolt comes with a padlock storage feature to keep your padlock close when not in use
NO DRAGGING OR DROPPING - The retention grooves feature prevents the Q-Bolt drop pin from dragging or dopping while opening and closing your gate
INDUSTRIAL STRENGTH - The Q-Bolt has strong polymer and stainless steel components, allowing for a sturdy mounting system to secure your gate
FOR METAL GATES - This stainless steel gate lock is the premium accessory for gate security; works for square post metal gates
40 INCH DROP ROD - The Q-bolt comes in two lengths to properly fit the style and size of your gate
description: Q-Bolt is an affordable, quality drop-bolt for retaining and securing driveway and other residential gates. This drop-bolt offers the option of padlock security, with the facility to store your padlock when not in use. A bolt retention feature prevents the rod from dropping and dragging across the driveways and also keeps the rod from being pulled out of the brackets when mounted to a gate. Backed by a limited Lifetime Warranty.   The Q-Bolt Drop Bolt comes in a variety of lengths, colors, and is compatible with different gate materials to match your needs of a drop bolt. The Q-Bolt obtains several features including retention tabs to prevent bolt dropping or dragging, a padlock storage feature, and mounting systems for metal, wood, and vinyl gates. The Electro-polished stainless steal is powder-coated meaning no need to worry about rust or stains.

For residential, commercial, driveway, security, privacy gate use  Part number: QB140  Color: Black  Bolt Length: 40”  Gate Size: Any size  Minimum Post Size: 1 ½” (38mm)  Gate Frame/Post Shape: Square to square  Ideal Gap: 1/4” (6mm)  Fixing Method: Screw-on  Gate Material: Metal
